definitions.definition: A nitro derivative of benzene , C 6 H 5 NO 2 , prepared by reacting benzene with a mixture of nitric and sulphuric acids ; any of a series of such compounds having two or more nitro groups.

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) A nitro derivative of benzene , C 6 H 5 NO 2 , prepared by reacting benzene with a mixture of nitric and sulphuric acids ; any of a series of such compounds having two or more nitro groups.
